name: GDA Gacha
description:
WE RECCOMEND PLAYING THIS IN FULLSCREEN!

We have a couple of tasks for this quarter, so if you'd like we'll need a bit of help.

Basically we're being introduced to this new thing that our producers found that will help allow us to "gain efficiency" or something like that. All we have to do is click cells on a spreadsheet and then roll for characters. Seems simple!

Controls:

Main Menu
- Click the images (Eric's Spreadsheet & Roll for Character) to go to the corresponding minigame

Spreadsheet
- Highlighted cells with text will pop up, click them to earn Queso Points

- When you need to go back click the "Main Menu" button

Roll for a Character

- Click the banner to roll for a character

- It should then prompt you with a box depending on how much points you have

- When you need to go back click the "Main Menu" button
